validation.departureDate: The departure date of the flight, in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation.originAirport: The origin airport of the flight, in IATA code
validation.destinationAirport: The destination airport of the flight, in IATA code
validation.adults: The number of adult passengers, age greater than 18
validation.children: The number of children passengers, age less than 18 but greater than 2
validation.infants: The number of infants passengers, age less than 2
validation.returnDate: The return date of the flight, in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation.isRoundTrip: Whether the flight search is a round trip
validation.passengers: The passengers mentioned by the user
validation.firstName: The first name of the passenger
validation.lastName: The last name of the passenger
validation.dateOfBirth: The date of birth of the passenger, in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation.passportNumber: The passport number of the passenger
validation.passportExpiryDate: The passport expiry date of the passenger, in YYYY-MM-DD format
